name: Slime Mama
description:
A pesky knight is digging his way into your peaceful home! Quickly feed slime mama to build up her strength before he arrives, so she can take down this threat to the valley. 

This game was created as part of the Ludum Dare 46 game jam, the theme was “Keep it alive”. Over the course of 72 hours, we created the game, it’s art and code ourselves. We playtested in the early hours before submission and thus may have some bugs. 

Check out our Ludum Dare entry here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/slime-mama

We hope you enjoy playing it as much as we do!

Controls:

  • A/D - Move Reft & Right
  • K/Space - Jump
  • J/E - Pickup + Throw
